channel.title: Trace Feature on XploR Eos IDE

item.title: Baremetal Trace View
item.description:
Baremetal Trace View

The Baremetal Trace View allows developers to analyze execution traces efficiently and correlate them with source code.

To access Baremetal Trace View, click View > Baremetal Trace, the widget will show in the panel. The Baremetal Trace View widget have two main parts:

  • Toolbar (Top):

    • Drop-down: Contains all available data that can be shown
    • Import button: Shows a dialog to specify trace data file and related tools
    • Refresh button: Decodes and refreshes GUI

  • Viewer (Bottom): Shows information of instructions and corresponding C code. Allows opening the source file of instruction/C code
